sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../index.css'; import Banner from './img/banner.png'; const works = [ { id: 1, name: 'Crypto Tracker', description: 'Application pour suivre la progression des cryptomonnaies actualisée en temps réel.', img: './icons/crypto.png', color: '#5856d6;', tag: '#Web #React JS #API', urlRepo: 'https://github.com/theodaguier/crypto-tracker', url: 'https://theodaguier.github.io/crypto-tracker/', }, { id: 2, name: 'Notes.', description: 'Application de prise de note rapide.', img: './icons/notes.png', color: '#ff3b30', tag: '#Web #React JS', urlRepo: '', url: 'https://notes-application-dt.netlify.app', }, { id: 3, name: 'Drum Kit', description: 'Simple drum kit.', img: './icons/music.svg', color: '#ff3b30', tag: '#Web #Javascript', urlRepo: 'https://github.com/theodaguier/drum-kit', url: 'https://joyful-halva-2c6ff3.netlify.app', }, { id: 4, name: 'Slide App', description: 'Application iOS découverte de musique basé sur le swipe.', img: './icons/music.svg', color: '#ff3b30', tag: '#Swift #SwiftUI', urlRepo: 'https://github.com/theodaguier/drum-kit', url: 'https://joyful-halva-2c6ff3.netlify.app', }, ]; function WorkWindow() { return (

Projets

Découvrez tous les projets réalisés

{works.map((work, index) => (

{work.name}

{work.description}

{work.tag}
))}
); } export default WorkWindow;
